Spring Security Framework

Uses of Interface
org.springframework.security.intercept.ObjectDefinitionSource

Packages that use ObjectDefinitionSource
org.springframework.security.annotation   
org.springframework.security.intercept Actually enforces the security and ties the whole security system together. 
org.springframework.security.intercept.method Provides support objects for securing Java method invocations via different AOP libraries. 
org.springframework.security.intercept.method.aopalliance Enforces security for AOP Alliance MethodInvocations, such as via Spring AOP. 
org.springframework.security.intercept.method.aspectj Enforces security for AspectJ JointPoints, delegating secure object callbacks to the calling aspect. 
org.springframework.security.intercept.web Enforces security for HTTP requests, typically by the URL requested. 
 

Uses of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.annotation
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.annotation that implement ObjectDefinitionSource
 class Jsr250MethodDefinitionSource
          Sources method security metadata from major JSR 250 security annotations.
 class SecuredMethodDefinitionSource
          Sources method security metadata from Spring Security's Secured annotation.
 

Uses of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.intercept
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.intercept that return ObjectDefinitionSource
abstract  ObjectDefinitionSource AbstractSecurityInterceptor.obtainObjectDefinitionSource()
           
 

Uses of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.intercept.method
 

Subinterfaces of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.intercept.method
 interface MethodDefinitionSource
          Interface for ObjectDefinitionSource implementations that are designed to perform lookups keyed on Methods.
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.intercept.method that implement ObjectDefinitionSource
 class AbstractFallbackMethodDefinitionSource
          Abstract implementation of MethodDefinitionSource that supports both Spring AOP and AspectJ and caches configuration attribute resolution from: 1.
 class AbstractMethodDefinitionSource
          Abstract implementation of MethodDefinitionSource.
 class DelegatingMethodDefinitionSource
          Automatically tries a series of method definition sources, relying on the first source of metadata that provides a non-null response.
 class MapBasedMethodDefinitionSource
          Stores a ConfigAttributeDefinition for a method or class signature.
 class MethodDefinitionAttributes
          Provides ConfigAttributeDefinitions for a method signature (via the lookupAttributes method) by delegating to a configured Attributes object.
 

Uses of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.intercept.method.aopalliance
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.intercept.method.aopalliance that return ObjectDefinitionSource
 ObjectDefinitionSource MethodSecurityInterceptor.obtainObjectDefinitionSource()
           
 

Uses of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.intercept.method.aspectj
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.intercept.method.aspectj that return ObjectDefinitionSource
 ObjectDefinitionSource AspectJSecurityInterceptor.obtainObjectDefinitionSource()
           
 ObjectDefinitionSource AspectJAnnotationSecurityInterceptor.obtainObjectDefinitionSource()
           
 

Uses of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.intercept.web
 

Subinterfaces of ObjectDefinitionSource in org.springframework.security.intercept.web
 interface FilterInvocationDefinitionSource
          Marker interface for ObjectDefinitionSource implementations that are designed to perform lookups keyed on FilterInvocations.
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.intercept.web that implement ObjectDefinitionSource
 class DefaultFilterInvocationDefinitionSource
          Default implementation of FilterInvocationDefinitionSource.
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.intercept.web that return ObjectDefinitionSource
 ObjectDefinitionSource FilterSecurityInterceptor.obtainObjectDefinitionSource()
